item.title: KubernetesBasics
item.description: What is Kubernetes? Kubernetes is an open source container orchestration platform that ease your life by automating many manual processing like deploying, scaling and managing containerized applications. So in foundation k8 managed containers that can be docker or any other technologies. Which means k8 helps you manage applications that are made up of hundreds of containers. Simply put you can break down an application into hundreds or thousands of microservices and deploy them on cloud using k8.
